@@ -68,8 +68,13 @@ filegroup(
     ],
 )
 
+# Build the gen tool as a library, as it will be linked to a core/ops binary
+# files before making it an executable.
 tf_java_op_gen_srcjar(
     name = "java_op_gen_sources",
+    api_def_srcs = [
+        "//tensorflow/core/api_def:base_api_def",

     gen_base_package = "org.tensorflow.op",
     gen_tool = "java_op_gen_tool",
     ops_libs = [
body: See previous comment, we still need to exclude some lib. But that list of dependencies will be set explicitly in the `java_op_gen_tool` binary rule instead... or thinking of it, maybe we should we link all libraries and exclude non-supported ops in the API defs instead?
